duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage qualitative and quantitative research projects, from selecting methodologies to authoring and presenting final reports.
Contribute to the creation and programming of consumer studies and surveys through an online platform.
Track and understand consumer and category trends, gathering online consumer insights.
Research the pet industry marketplace and competitors, compiling and organizing research findings.
Alert team of new and emerging trends to assist with product concept development.
Organize sales data into an easy-to-understand visual format and perform various administrative duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
